ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides adds postfix and infix logic operators for if, then, unless, and otherwise.
Provides adds postfix and infix logic operators for if, then, unless, and otherwise.

name: r-postlogic
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.0.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-postlogic
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/postlogic_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/postlogic/postlogic_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 3c61e2c8f91237efa51176d6aa43ccffdecd0c8284c006d2f3f79733acab7785

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('postlogic')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('postlogic')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/RDocTaskForce/postlogic
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Provides adds postfix and infix logic operators for if, then, unless, and otherwise.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: postlogic
# Type: Package
# Title: Infix and Postfix Logic Operators
# Version: 0.1.0.1
# Authors@R: person("Andrew", "Redd", role = c("aut", "cre") , email = "Andrew.Redd@hsc.utah.edu" , comment = c(ORCID = "https://orcid.org/0000-0002-6149-2438") )
# Maintainer: Andrew Redd <Andrew.Redd@hsc.utah.edu>
# Description: Provides adds postfix and infix logic operators for if, then, unless, and otherwise.
# Language: en-US
# License: GPL-2
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# Suggests: testthat, covr
# URL: https://github.com/RDocTaskForce/postlogic
# BugReports: https://github.com/RDocTaskForce/postlogic/issues
# NeedsCompilation: no
